Verses: 1 pillaigale, Neengal Thagappan Podhagaththaik Kettu, Buththiyai Adaiyumpadi Gavaniyungal.
2 naan Ungalukku Narpodhagaththaith Tharugiren; En Ubadhesaththai Vidaadhirungal.
3 naan En Thagappanukkup Piriyamaana Kumaaranum, En Thaaikku Migavum Arumaiyaana Ore Pillaiyumaanavan.
4 avar Enakkup Podhiththu Sonnadhu: Un Irudhayam En Vaarththaigalaik Kaaththukkollakkadavadhu; En Kattalaigalaik Kaikkol, Appozhudhu Pizhaippaai.
5 gnaanaththai Sambaadhi, Buththiyaiyum Sambaadhi; En Vaayin Vaarththaigalai Maravaamalum Vittu Vilagaamalum Iru.
6 adhai Vidaadhe, Adhu Unnaith Tharkaakkum: Adhinmel Piriyamaayiru, Adhu Unnaik Kaaththukkollum.
7 gnaaname Mukkiyam, Gnaanaththai Sambaadhi; Ennaththai Sambaadhiththaalum Buththiyai Sambaadhiththukkol.
8 nee Adhai Menmaippaduththu, Adhu Unnai Menmaippaduththum; Nee Adhaith Thazhuvikkondaal, Adhu Unnai Ganampannum.
9 adhu Un Thalaikku Alangaaramaana Mudiyaik Kodukkum; Adhu Magimaiyaana Greedaththai Unakku Soottum.
10 en Magane, Kel, En Vaarththaigalai Etrukkol; Appozhudhu Un Aayusin Varushangal Adhigamaagum.
11 gnaanamaarkkaththai Naan Unakkup Podhiththen; Sevvaiyaana Paadhaigalile Unnai Nadaththinen.
12 nee Avaigalil Nadakkumbodhu Un Nadaigalukku Idukkan Undaavadhillai; Nee Avaigalil Odinaalum Idaramaattaai.
13 buththimadhiyai Urudhiyaaip Patrikkol, Adhai Vittuvidaadhe; Adhaikkaaththukkol, Adhuve Unakku Jeevan.
14 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Paadhaiyil Pravesiyaadhe; Theeyorudaiya Vazhiyil Nadavaadhe.
15 adhai Veruththuvidu, Adhin Vazhiyaaip Pogaadhe; Adhai Vittu Vilagik Kadandhupo.
16 pollaappu Seydhaalozhiya Avargalukku Niththirai Varaadhu; Avargal Yaaraiyaagilum Vizhappannaadhirundhaal Avargal Thookkam Kalaindhupom.
17 avargal Aagaamiyaththin Appaththaip Pusiththu, Kodumaiyin Rasaththaik Kudikkiraargal.
18 needhimaangaludaiya Paadhai Naduppagalvaraikkum Adhigamadhigamaaip Pragaasikkira Sooriyappragaasampolirukkum.
19 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Paadhaiyo Kaarirulaippolirukkum; Thaangal Idaruvadhu Innadhil Endru Ariyaargal.
20 en Magane, En Vaarththaigalai Gavani; En Vasanangalukku Un Seviyai Saai.
21 avaigal Un Kangalai Vittuppiriyaadhiruppadhaaga; Avaigalai Un Irudhayaththukkulle Kaaththukkol.
22 avaigalaik Kandupidikkiravargalukku Avaigal Jeevanum, Avargal Udalukkellaam Aarokkiyamumaam.
23 ellaak Kaavalodum Un Irudhayaththaik Kaaththukkol, Adhinidaththinindru Jeevaootru Purappadum.
24 vaayin Thaarumaarugalai Unnai Vittagatri, Udhadugalin Maarupaattai Unakku Dhoorappaduththu.
25 un Kangal Neraai Nokkakkadavadhu; Un Kannimaigal Unakku Munne Sevvaiyaaip Paarkkakkadavadhu.
26 un Kaal Nadaiyai Seerthookkippaar; Un Vazhigalellaam Nilaivarappattiruppadhaaga.
27 valadhupuramaavadhu Idadhupuramaavadhu Saayaadhe; Un Kaalaith Theemaikku Vilakkuvaayaaga.
